body_html:
I'll be interested in hearing the reason for this when you figure out!

Also FYI: DyNet can also use MKL if you want to abstract away from differences in the backend: http://dynet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/install.html#mkl-support

Also FYI: DyNet can also use MKL if you want to abstract away from differences in the backend: http://dynet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/install.html#mkl-support
